Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $1000000 to you. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950000. This offer is designed to provide you with an exclusive chance to secure such a high-value asset at a reduced cost. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
